name: Elems
description: Elems is an arcade logic game and its goal is to collect the Orb of Life Shards, scattered across 32 levels in 4 zones: Hellish, Icy, Stone and Water zone.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP and above Processor: Any type Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any type Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any type Additional Notes: Mouse, Joystick, Gamepad.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any type Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any type Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any type Additional Notes: Mouse, Joystick, Gamepad.

reviews.review_text: This goes way back to a game called Crystal Mines on the original Nintendo. Running under the falling objects, trying to avoid getting crushed by your own gems brings back memories. Grapfics are great, controls are tight, and runs smooth. Totally recommend, especially for old school players
